"We received great service from the sales, operations, project manager and owner." "The quality of work and customer service is top notch!" "The design by Michael was fantastic and we absolutely love the finished product."

We had a super experience with Greg and team on our pool build. Kolby, the pool designer, listened to our wishes and designed the perfect pool for use. Greg and the construction team met all scheduled deadlines and kept us apprised of project progress throughout the build.  I would definitely recommend COT.

We are very pleased with the overall quality,service,cost and customer service. My family have no complaints and we enjoy our pool year around. We even use COT pool cleaning service. Chris is AMAZING!!! We really enjoyed the process of seeing our backyard turn into a tropical oasis.

We were one of Custom Outdoor Trends' initial customers back in 2013.  The owner/designer was so attentive to what we wanted and in the areas that we were unsure of they filled in the creative gaps.  From the design to the pre-construction … More
